Text:
The most embarrassing and cringeworthy film I've ever seen.

A $20m piece of Georgian propaganda that ignores the facts completely.

Even the UN report admits that Georgia started the war.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1486193/

Scroll down and read the review 2/3rds down the page.

Please don't waste your time and life with this crap,you'll never get that 90 minutes back again,download one of .BONE.'s other excellent uploads instead.
